description:
A man listens to the world around him, a dog and cat rescue their master, and a ghost is lost in rhyme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiki Mimi Zukin / Inu to Neko to Takaramono / Yuurei no Utayomi
The Listening Hood / The Dog and Cat`s Treasure / The Ghost`s Poem Reading
きき耳ずきん / 犬と猫と宝物 / 幽霊の歌よみ
